sections.title: About me
sections.description: Here's a little bit about me:
items: I'm a web developer based in San Francisco, CA.
I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various web development frameworks.
In my free time, I enjoy hiking, reading, and playing the guitar.
